title: Foundational Learning for Optimizing Organic Rankine Cycles

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematics and foundational thermodynamics concepts
context.additional_context: Providing content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, focusing on theoretical learning and simple case analyses.

learning_goals: The fundamental principles and components of the organic Rankine cycle can be explained
Limitations of existing optimization methods can be analyzed through literature review
The applicability of machine learning-based optimization approaches can be logically evaluated

resources: Smartphone app with basic calculator functionality
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
